Class TownGraphManager

java.lang.Object
TownGraphManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
TownGraphManagerInterface
public class TownGraphManager extends Object implements TownGraphManagerInterface
The TownGraphManager class manages a graph of towns and roads

  • Method Details

    • addRoad

      public boolean addRoad(String town1, String town2, int weight, String roadName)
      Adds a road between two towns with a specified weight and name.
      Specified by:
      addRoad in interface TownGraphManagerInterface
      Parameters:
      town1 - the name of the first town
      town2 - the name of the second town
      weight - the weight of the road (distance or cost)
      roadName - the name of the road
      Returns:
      true if the road was successfully added, false otherwise

    • getRoad

      public String getRoad(String town1, String town2)
      Retrieves the name of the road connecting two towns.
      Specified by:
      getRoad in interface TownGraphManagerInterface
      Parameters:
      town1 - the name of the first town
      town2 - the name of the second town
      Returns:
      the name of the road connecting the towns, or null if no such road exists

    • populateTownGraph

      public void populateTownGraph(File selectedFile) throws IOException
      Populates the graph with towns and roads from a file.
      Parameters:
      selectedFile - the file containing town and road data
      Throws:
      IOException - if the file cannot be read
